display_help: This power emanates a very short cone of Frost from the Hero's hands chilling all those in its arc. This attacks slowly chills the target over time, slowly dealing damage and slowing his attack speed.
display_target_help: This power emanates a very short cone of Frost from the Hero's hands chilling all those in its arc. This attacks slowly chills the target over time, slowly dealing damage and slowing his attack speed.
